processor.name: CheckECBARInstalled
processor.description: This plugin retrieves the division currency set for the division to which the specified account is associated

configdata.Program:
CREATE PROCEDURE CheckECBARInstalled @CheckECBARInstalled VARCHAR(200) OUTPUT AS
SELECT cast( value as VARCHAR(200) ) into @CheckECBARInstalled FROM t_db_values WHERE parameter = 'IsECBARInstalled'
